name: A Boy and His Beard (itch)
description:
A Boy and His Beard is a fast-paced arcade experience that lets you fight hordes of enemies with your beard.

Survive waves of enemies while you collect as many enemy beards and achievements as possible!

Use objects to deal greater damage to enemies and shield yourself from projectiles!

A variety of enemies will test your ability and your beard!

This is currently a lite version. Check back later for the full version (also coming to Steam) that will include awesome narrative and intense boss fights.

- Windows
- Controller Required
